skillDescription: Release a powerful horizontal slash with the sword# dealing damage to enemies.
Conjure a magical orb that homes in on the nearest enemy.
Fire a precise arrow at a target# dealing damage from a distance.
Throw a shuriken at a target# dealing damage from a distance.
Unleash a powerful sword slash that sends out a piercing wave of radiant energy. This waves deals damage to each target it passes through.
Summon a condensed sphere of lightning energy that hovers in a single direction. This sphere deals damage to each target it passes through.
Fire a large rocket that pierces through multiple enemies in a line# dealing damage to each.
Throw a large dagger that pierces any target# dealing damage from a distance.
